fig, ax = plt.subplots(ncols=len(df.columns)//2+1, nrows=2, figsize=(20, 10))

index = 0
ax = ax.flatten()

for col, value in df.items():
 sns.boxplot(y=col, data=df, ax=ax[index])
 index += 1
